mapper.insert: insert into reply(board_brd_num, rep_contents, rep_id) values(#{brd_num}, #{rep_contents}, #{rep_id})
mapper.update: update reply set reply_contents = #{reply_contents}, update_date = now() where rep_num = #{rep_num}
mapper.select: select * from reply where board_brd_num = #{brd_num} order by board_brd_num desc
